title: Customer Service
subtitle: We’re here to help with orders, returns, delivery, and technical issues.
form_consent_text: I agree to the processing of my data to resolve this request.
faq_a1: Most orders ship within 24–48 hours. Use your order number to track the parcel in your account or contact us above.
faq_q2: How do I return an item?
faq_a2: Initiate a return in your account within 14 days of delivery. We’ll email a return label and next steps.
faq_a3: Use “Forgot password” on the login page. If you still can’t access the account, submit a request with your email address.
submit_success: Your request has been submitted. We’ll email you shortly.
